title: False LoL website
body:
Recently i received a message from RitoMason and sent me a link saying:
[12:37] Rito Mason: Link Removed
free rp

I have seen many of these false websites from many mmorpg and they usually steal the player's account by simply typing in their username and password
Could you please get veigar to 'dark matter' this summoner to prevent other people from getting their accounts stolen.

To players who who may have seen this or similar to it please check the URL link and DO NOT BE FOOLED as "Looks can be deceiving."

replies.body: Thanks for the site, visiting it now.
